remarks: Value of join function for a poset.  (Contributed by NM, 12-Sep-2011.) (Revised by NM, 9-Sep-2018.)  TODO: prove ~ joinfval2 first to reduce net proof size (existence part)?
statement:
joinfval.u $e |- U = ( lub ` K ) $.
joinfval.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
joinfval $p |- ( K e. V -> .\/ = { <. <. x , y >. , z >. | { x , y } U z } ) $.
$d K x y z $.
$d U z $.
